description:
Amano Misao is http://anidb.net/ch2311 [Akira]`s great-niece. She is a very shy girl who loves to spend her time with Akira, whom she often refers to as onii-chan. She cares for him deeply and it`s very common to see her cooking for him or worrying about him.
After seeing Yoriko give Akira a kiss, she is beginning to realise that her feelings for Akira are more than just affection.
name: Amano Misao
